input: Title: Trading homework. Sentence 1: Janet had too much homework to do that day. Sentence 2: She asked her brother to do all her math equations for her. Sentence 3: He accepted if she'd write an essay for his English class. Sentence 4: They agreed and did as promised. Choices: a. They were very lucky as no one realized what had happened. b. And the driver seeing her despair, stopped the bus to let her in.

Title: Collapse. Sentence 1: An air conditioner fell in the office. Sentence 2: Several objects started to fall afterwards. Sentence 3: Everyone had to evacuate the building after an announcement. Sentence 4: The office was relocated since the building was deteriorating. Choices: a. The officer writes Robert a ticket and tells him to obey the law. b. We didn't return into next year.

Title: Basketball.. Sentence 1: Jack was going to try out for basketball for his school. Sentence 2: He wasn't sure if he would make it so he asked me for help. Sentence 3: I am very good at basketball so I gave him some tips. Sentence 4: He was very nervous still but more confident. Choices: a. When he tried out the coach told him no and he was sad. b. The parents were thankful they'd found a great caretaker.
